item.title: Not setting because 'void' type not allowed here?
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

Compiling src\org\dementhium\content\DialogueManager.java:60: error: 'void' type not allow ed here sendDialogue(player, HAPPY_TALKING, -1, 9053, "I'll star t off with a bet of " + player.setBet(5000000) + "."); ^ 1 error Complete Press any key to continue . . .

[code=java]
public void setBet(int bet) {
this.bet = bet;
}

public int getBet() {
	return bet;
}[/code]

case 9052: if (!player.getInventory().contains(995, 5000000)) { sendDialogue(player, MEAN_FACE, -1, 9053, "You need 5M or more to play me!"); } else { sendDialogue(player, HAPPY_TALKING, -1, 9053, "I'll start off with a bet of " + player.setBet(5000000) + "."); } return true;
It’s returning something.
I see nothing wrong with it.

Read full topic
item.source: Not setting because 'void' type not allowed here?
